Análisis bibliométrico con R

UDC Ranking’s Group

scimetr 0.3.6 : 2023-04-21

Source: vignettes/docs/R_packages.Rmd
R_packages.Rmd

Paquetes para análisis bibliométrico

  • CITAN: CITation ANalysis Toolpack.

    Gagolewski, M. (2011). Bibliometric impact assessment with R and the CITAN package, Journal of Informetrics, 5(4), pp. 678-692, DOI: 10.1016/j.joi.2011.06.006, revised version.

  • bibliometrix: An R-Tool for Comprehensive Science Mapping Analysis.

    Aria, M. & Cuccurullo, C. (2017). bibliometrix: An R-tool for comprehensive science mapping analysis, Journal of Informetrics, 11(4), pp 959-975, Elsevier, DOI: 10.1016/j.joi.2017.08.007.

  • scimetr: Analysis of Scientific Publication Data with R.

Paquetes para descarga de datos

  • wosr: Clients to the ‘Web of Science’ and ‘InCites’ APIs.

  • rwos: R interface with Web of Science API Lite.

  • rscopus: Scopus Database API Interface.

  • …

ropensci: Transforming science through open data and software

Seleccionando el filtro Literature en ropensci/packages se obtiene un listado de paquetes que pueden ser de utilidad en este campo. Entre ellos:

  • aRxiv: Interface to the arXiv API.

  • rcrossref: R interface to various CrossRef APIs.

  • crminer: Fetch ‘Scholary’ Full Text from ‘Crossref’.

  • europepmc: R Interface to the Europe PubMed Central RESTful Web Service.

  • fulltext: Full Text of ‘Scholarly’ Articles Across Many Data Sources.

  • IEEER: Interface to the IEEE Xplore Gateway.

  • jstor: Read Data from JSTOR/DfR.

  • rorcid: Interface to the ‘Orcid.org’ API.

  • rplos: R client for the PLoS Journals API.

Otros paquetes/herramientas

  • Diderot

  • https://github.com/topics/bibliometrics?l=r

  • …
